name: Chris Guida
cooked: Is it possible to enable replies to emails received from mailing list mode? I’m noticing the emails I receive come from noreply@delvingbtc.erisian.com.au. I feel like being able to reply to the emails would allow users who prefer the old-style ML experience to continue interacting with the bitcoin dev community they way they’re used to.
raw: Is it possible to enable replies to emails received from mailing list mode? I'm noticing the emails I receive come from `noreply@delvingbtc.erisian.com.au`. I feel like being able to reply to the emails would allow users who prefer the old-style ML experience to continue interacting with the bitcoin dev community they way they're used to.
